svg.text: Why subword tokenization handles unknown words gracefully
t h e c a t s a t r a n d o g
BPE: more tokens, never loses meaning
BPE falls back to characters → meaning preserved
BPE trades token count for coverage.
More tokens per text, but never says "I don't know"
"scattered" → Word sees nothing. BPE finds "cat" inside.
Morphological awareness emerges from frequency-based merging
